title: Champions League final streaker Kinsey Wolanski's jet-setting lifestyle of pranks, boats and boxing
text:
Get the biggest football stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kinsey Wolanski burst onto the scene back in June earlier this year when she streaked at the Champions League final between Liverpool and Tottenham Hotspur.

Kinsey, 23, ran across the Wanda Metropolitano pitch in a black swimsuit which promoted her boyfriend’s X-rated website during the first half.

The model’s Instagram following rapidly increased from 300,000 to more than three million, with football fans all over the world clamouring to see more of the model.

Russian Wolanski has modelled for FHM and Pretty Little Thing, and revealed she had even been sent flirty messages by numerous Liverpool players after the Champions League final.

“I’m not revealing any names, but a couple of the Liverpool players did send me private flirty messages after i streaked the game," she said. "One sent some heart emojis and the other one a message saying, ‘I saw you at the game’.”

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: WireImage)

Her boyfriend is Vitaly Zdorovetskiy - the founder of X-rated site Vitaly Uncensored and YouTube channel VitalyzdTv. The site claims to be full of “wild pranks, t**s and a** and the YouTuber also benefitted as a result of the stunt, with a reported £3m generated in advertising.

Vitaly is a Russian-American YouTuber best know for his prank channel - VitalyzdTv. He has 10.2m subscribers as of October 2019.

The streak stunt in Madrid was no one-off for Vitaly Uncensored, with Zdorovetskiy’s mum attempting to invade the pitch at this year's Cricket World Cup final between England and New Zealand at Lord’s.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: GC Images)

Meanwhile, Kinsey has attempted to recreate the feat at the Copa America final between Brazil and Peru since rising to fame.

However, this attempt wasn’t as successful, ending with her and Zdorovetskiy behind bars.

Wolanski then posted on Instagram alongside photos of her in disguise: “I’ll admit Copa America you definitely won but we had one hell of an adventure trying.

(Image: Kinsey Wolanski/Instagram)

“Flew to Brazil, dressed up in disguise, made it to our seats and it ended in Vitaly’s bad a** getting tackled by 20 security guards.

“We are out of jail now and enjoying our time in Brazil!”

The blonde has, though, made clear her desire to focus on her real estate dream as she seeks to make the most of her new found fame, saying: “I’m a real estate agent and investor.

"My long-term goal is to save everything i make and invest back into real estate.

“Build an empire and have passive income.”

Wolanski is active on Instagram and shares snaps of her Champagne lifestyle, including partying on Dan Bilzerian's yacht and keeping in shape by boxing in the gym.
description: The 23-year-old made headlines around the world when she interrupted Tottenham v Liverpool by running on the pitch in a swimsuit
